name: Simple Cheesy Cauliflower Soup
author: annyf_82
summary: Simple, quick, and delicious cheesy cauliflower soup. Great comfort food that fills you up and warms you from the inside out! Serve with some warm, crusty bread on the side and you're set.
ingredients: 1 medium head cauliflower, chopped into small florets
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat
Add onion and fry until softened, 3 to 5 minutes
Add chicken broth and cauliflower; bring to a boil
Reduce heat slightly and boil gently until cauliflower is tender, 20 to 30 minutes
Whisk milk and flour together in a bowl
When cauliflower is tender, slowly add milk-flour mixture, stirring until combined
Simmer until soup has thickened, about 5 minutes
Remove from the heat and stir in grated Cheddar until melted and blended together
